title: The Development Control Regulations sanctioned for Ratnagiri - Sindhudurg Regional Plan shall cease
clause_text: The Development Control Regulations sanctioned for Ratnagiri - Sindhudurg Regional Plan shall cease to operate and following provisions shall be applicable -
